tool.name: xcms-setphenotype
tool.command:
/usr/local/bin/setphenotype.r galaxyNames=' #for $zip2 in $rawfiles: $zip2, #end for '
realNames=' #for $zip in $rawfiles: ${zip.name}, #end for ' outputcsv=$outfilecsvin cleanFileName=$cleanFileNameOption appendTo=$infilecvs appendToName=$appendToNameParm input=$infile phenoDataColumn=$phenocol output=$outfile inputraw=$rawfiles;

param.name: phenocol
param.label: Column showing the group of the files

param.name: cleanFileNameOption
param.label: Clean galaxy names and only leave the sample part

param.name: appendToNameParm
param.label: Column showing the real name of the files
